Subskills.name: Clean Hits
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using omnislash.

Subskills.name: Lucky Strikes
Subskills.description: Omnislash now always procs all your striking effects on hit with halved amount of slashes and decreased damage. Omnislash cooldown is increased.

Subskills.name: Powerful Slashes
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by omnislash.

Subskills.name: Looming Cover
Subskills.description: When cast inside a smoke bomb invulnerability lasts for a small duration after omnislash ends.

Subskills.name: Nail In The Coffin
Subskills.description: Throw a piercing kunai at a nearby enemy with reduced damage each strike.

Subskills.name: Emperor's Orders
Subskills.description: Striking monsters with Omnislash has a chance to cast empires slash.

Subskills.name: Thunder Slashes
Subskills.description: Unleash chain lightning with each slash inflicting lightning break on hit.

Subskills.name: Thirst For Death
Subskills.description: Chance to increase the amount of slashes depending on your critical strike chance.

Subskills.name: Cutting Machine
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt by omnislash.

Subskills.name: Rain Of Chaos
Subskills.description: Each slash now drops a shadow meteor down from the sky dealing area of effect damage when landing.

Subskills.name: Poison Coated Daggers
Subskills.description: Throw poison coated daggers around with each slash inflicting poisoned and dealing increased damage to poisoned targets.
